text:
A person holding a Cable System Franchise that is not for an OVS may not acquire an OVS Franchise for the same Facilities unless the Person applies for an OVS Franchise. Similarly, a Person holding an OVS Franchise may not acquire a Cable System Franchise that is not for an OVS unless the Person applies for an appropriate Franchise. In either case, the Person's acceptance of a new Franchise Pursuant to Section 
11.13(j) above shall not be effective unless it includes an instrument in a form approved by the City Attorney surrendering the pre-existing Franchise. 
(Added by Ord. 58-00, File No. 000198, App. 4/7/2000)
